means: 蹦蹦跳跳地跑，惊惶奔跑

sentence.Network_en: Let the dog for a scamper.
Bundles of candles were procured, and straightway there was a general scamper up the hill.
sentence.Network_cn: 一捆捆蜡烛拿了出来, 大家立即欢快地开始爬山.

sentence.Network_en: " And, discerning the scarlet letter on her breast, would scamper off with a strange, contagious fear. "
sentence.Network_cn: 待 到看清她胸前的红字, 便怀着一种害怕受到传染的奇异的恐惧, 迅速逃开了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... reaper 收割者 scamper 奔跑，快跑 pamper 纵容，过分关怀.
《哈利·波特》_互动百科 ... Duro 幻影石板 “scamper 奔跳”、 “scatter 散开”和.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... scalp 头皮 scamper 疾走 scan 细看.
GRE_背词新思路 - 豆丁网 ... tamper（ 乱弄） 出牢笼好高兴 scamper（ 蹦蹦跳跳） 以 amass（ 聚集） 围墙把庄园.

list.abs: ...。 而老少咸宜的有李茂晖教授的六项法则或美国的奔驰法（scamper method） 。 此外有德国的 635 法、 脑力激荡法及随机字法 (…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in the sense 'run away'): probably from scamp

entry.tran: （步子小而轻地）奔跑，疾走;蹦蹦跳跳
entry.def: When people or small animals scamper somewhere, they move there quickly with small, light steps.

example.ex: Children scampered off the yellow school bus and into the playground...
example.tran: 孩子们欢快地跑下黄色的校车，冲进运动场。

example.ex: The flash sent the foxes scampering away.
example.tran: 闪光惊得狐狸四处逃窜。

means.word_mean: 1. rushing about hastily in an undignified way
1. to move about or proceed hurriedly;

sentences.sentence: "so terrified by the extraordinary ebbing of the sea that they scurried to higher ground"

auth_sentence.content: He paused, as if startled by something he heard, and proceeded to scamper quickly off into the forest.
auth_sentence.res_content: He paused, as if startled by something he heard, and proceeded to scamper quickly off into the forest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He paused, as if startled by something he heard, and proceeded to scamper quickly off into the forest.

auth_sentence.content: Spotters, often a male coach, usually scamper underneath gymnasts as they prepare to do aerial moves.
auth_sentence.res_content: Spotters, often a male coach, usually scamper underneath gymnasts as they prepare to do aerial moves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Spotters, often a male coach, usually scamper underneath gymnasts as they prepare to do aerial moves.

auth_sentence.content: You can also pause and rewind live TV so no more missing the end of Mad Men while you scamper to the toilet.
